mapper.insert: insert into carrot_table(carrot_class, carrot_name, carrot_date, carrot_books, carrot_memorization, carrot_speech, carrot_read, carrot_trans, carrot_solving, carrot_listen, carrot_getting, carrot_showdown, carrot_report, carrot_perfection, carrot_result) values(#{carrot_class}, #{carrot_name}, #{carrot_date}, #{carrot_books}, #{carrot_memorization}, #{carrot_speech}, #{carrot_read}, #{carrot_trans}, #{carrot_solving}, #{carrot_listen}, #{carrot_getting}, #{carrot_showdown}, #{carrot_report}, #{carrot_perfection}, #{carrot_result});
